original_text: While the women were on their way, some of the guards went into the city and reported to the chief priests everything that had happened.
korean_text: 여자들이 갈 때 경비병 중 몇이 성에 들어가 모든 된 일을 대제사장들에게 알리니

sentences.original_text: While the women were on their way
some of the guards went into the city
sentences.korean_translation: 경비병 중 몇 명이 도시로 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and reported to the chief priests
